Html:
I have a question, but wanted to first congratulate you on your great implementation.
I would like to use their algorithm to insert Steiner predefined points within a mesh. With Poly2Tri library that's possible, but I would like to use its code, it is possible to obtain the same result? how?
I need it to apply triangulation on a contour and points calculated by Straight Skeleton.

Thanks!

I got the results I need using Segments to define the outline of the mesh.
This correct?
Image
Its framework is really good, congratulations!!
